column2: "Na muhun abowa bi dɛ ofi po mu reba a ɔwɔ mmbɛn du nye etsir esuon
column3: na ahenkyɛw du soso ne mmbɛn

column2: "Na abowa no a muhun no no tse dɛ ɔsebɔ
column3: na ne nan tse dɛ sisi
column4: na n'ano tse dɛ gyata: na sasabɔnsam no dze n'ahoɔdzen
column6: nye no tum kɛse maa no."

column2: "Na muhun n'etsir no mu kor tse dɛ wɔabɔ no ɔbɔkum; na wɔayɛ no bɔkum pira no edur: na abowa no ho yɛɛ wiadzefo nyina nwanwa

column3: osiandɛ ɔdze no tum ama abowa no
column4: na wɔkotowee sɔɔr abowa no see dɛ
column5: Woana nye abowa no sɛ? Na woana botum nye no edzi ako?"

column2: "Wɔmaa no ano a ɔka nsɛnkɛse nye ebususɛm; na wɔmaa no kwan dɛ ondzi tum abosoom eduanan ebien."
"Na obuee n'ano kaa ebususɛm tsiaa Nyankopɔn
column5: mekyerɛ hɔn a wɔtsetse sor noho no ebususɛm."

column2: "Na wɔmaa no ho kwan dɛ ɔnye ahotseweefo no ndzi ako
column3: na ondzi hɔn do konyim: na wɔmaa no tum wɔ mbusuakuw nye nkorɔfo
column4: nye kasa nye amanaman nyina do."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔtsetse asaase do nyina bɔkotow no
column3: hɔn a wɔannkyerɛw hɔn edzin wɔ Eguambaa no a wofi wiadze ahyɛse kum no no ne nkwa nwoma no mu no."
ndɔmmum na ɔbɔkɔ: sɛ obi dze afona ku a
column4: afona na wɔdze boku no. Ha na ahotseweefo abotar nye gyedzi wɔ."

column2: "Na muhun abowa bi so dɛ ofi asaase mu rupue; na ɔwɔ mmbɛn ebien dɛ eguambaa
"Na ɔdze abowa a odzi kan no no tum nyina wɔ n'enyim. Na ɔmaa asaase nye hɔn a wɔtsetse do kotoow abowa a odzi kan no a wɔyɛɛ no bɔkum pira edur no."
"Na ɔyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze akɛse dɛ ɔma ogya mpo fi sor ba asaase do wɔ nyimpa enyim."
"Na ɔdaadaa hɔn a wɔtsetse asaase do
column3: wɔ nsɛnkyerɛdze a wɔdze maa no dɛ ɔnyɛ wɔ abowa no enyim ntsi; ɔkaa dɛ wɔnyɛ abowa no a afona piraa no
column4: na ɔtse ase no no honyi."

column2: "Na wɔdze maa no dɛ ɔmfa ahom mma abowa no no honyi no
column3: ama abowa no no honyi no aakasa
column4: na ɔmma wonku dodow a wɔnnkɔkotow abowa no no honyi no."

column5: adehye nye nkowaa nsew wɔ hɔn nsa nyimfa

column2: "na eso dɛ obi nntum nntɔ anaa ɔnntɔn
column4: anaa abowa no ne dzin nkanee nko."

column2: "Ha na nyansa wɔ. Obi a ɔwɔ ntseasee
column3: wɔmma ɔnkan abowa no ne nkanee dodow; na ɔyɛ nyimpa bi ne nkanee: na ne nkanee si ahaesia eduosia esia."
